Yesterday I led more than 50 of my colleagues in a push for more funds for Tribal and Urban Indian Health Facilities.

Our Tribal and Native communities are disproportionately impacted by COVID-19 and these health facilities are in danger of closing. We can't let that happen.

It’d be like if Da Vinci finished the Mona Lisa then turned around in the same day and wrote “Jolene”

Think about the micro businesses down the street—they’re the heart and soul of our communities and they need help. @RepPressley and I introduced the Saving our Street Act today to get money to our smallest businesses that truly need it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXXS-EFXsAAgRVK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1258143267876675588/vid/320x320/4FRuvRRct7iLDDHV.mp4?tag=13

To all our nation’s nurses, but especially those on the front lines of this crisis, thank you for the physical and emotional care you provide every day. But thanks isn’t enough. We must fight to ensure all health care professionals have adequate PPE. #NationalNursesDay

To beat this virus and to rebuild a country that is stronger than it was before, we must start fighting right now for the future we want. Read more in my @essence op-ed: https://www.essence.com/feature/to-build-a-new-normal-start-now/

The Trump Administration must not take away health care from tens of millions of Americans in the middle of a pandemic. The President should end his lawsuit seeking to dismantle the ACA and the crucial pre-existing condition protections it includes. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXV_SlkXsAA78cl.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1258043043875303424/vid/480x270/p1Hdio7dY11VaWg5.mp4?tag=13

To the nurses across America who are caring for our sick with unbelievable bravery and compassion: 

We stand with you. We will not stop fighting for the workplace safety, protective gear and the hazard pay you deserve. #NationalNursesDay https://twitter.com/ajplus/status/1258057567844130816 QT @ajplus "I don't think people understand how stressful this job is."

This New York nurse broke down after her shift in the ICU, describing the trauma of so many patient deaths. #NationalNursesDay

Neighborhood businesses are being shut out from relief while large companies receive millions. I'm talking about bodegas, nail salons, florists and more.

So today, @RepPressley and I introduced the Saving Our Street Act to provide grants for micro-businesses that truly need it.

.@CitizensBank has funded 32k #PPPLoans valued at approximately $4.2 billion, saving an estimated nearly 400k jobs. 90% of total loans went to #smallbiz with fewer than 25 employees. #PPPworks  https://www.citizensbank.com/learning/small-business-big-impact.aspx?WT.mc_id=Citizens-Social-Twitter-Generic-CB-Learning-Coronavirus-Paid-S0680

We owe our deepest gratitude to all of the nurses fighting for us on the front lines. They are lightworkers in these dark times—selflessly risking their own well-being to care for the most vulnerable. Their heroism during this crisis must never be forgotten. #NationalNursesDay

A payroll tax cut would gut Social Security and Medicare funding.

And let’s be clear: payroll tax cuts don’t help if you aren’t on a payroll. This should be a non-starter.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/05/business/economy/trump-tax-cuts-coronavirus-stimulus.html

You need health care whether you’re working or not, whether you have a good- or bad-paying job, whether you’re old or a kid.

Health care must be a human right. 

If we don’t learn that lesson right now, we will never learn that lesson.

Hedge funds, private equity firms, & the richest Americans shouldn’t be getting another $135 billion tax break during this crisis. I’m fighting to repeal these tax giveaways in the CARES Act. https://twitter.com/4TaxFairness/status/1257733218440224768 QT @4TaxFairness Thank you, @SenWarren, for fighting back against the $135B #MillionairesGiveaway Mitch McConnell & the GOP slipped into the CARES Act! Together, we can make sure our pandemic response gives aid to those who need it most, NOT to millionaires, hedge funds & private equity giants. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1257706627890905091/pu/img/PuFswHtgo6C45GB5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1257706627890905091/pu/vid/320x320/qzGxnbWlaXOrMAFJ.mp4?tag=10
